Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

pages.profileDescription: Manage your personal information and preferences
pages.securityDescription: Manage your password, two-factor authentication, and sessions
pages.apiKeysDescription: Create and manage API keys for programmatic access
pages.organizationsDescription: Manage your organizations and team memberships
pages.customDescription: Example of individual settings components for custom layouts

BetterAuthUI.ACCOUNTS_DESCRIPTION: Switch between your currently signed in accounts.
BetterAuthUI.AVATAR_DESCRIPTION: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
BetterAuthUI.BACKUP_CODES_DESCRIPTION: Save these backup codes in a secure place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your two-factor authentication method.
BetterAuthUI.CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your current password and a new password.
BetterAuthUI.DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
BetterAuthUI.EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Enter the email address you want to use to log in.
BetterAuthUI.EMAIL_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter a valid email address.
BetterAuthUI.FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to reset your password
BetterAuthUI.FORGOT_PASSWORD_EMAIL: Check your email for the password reset link.
BetterAuthUI.MAGIC_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to receive a magic link
BetterAuthUI.MAGIC_LINK_EMAIL: Check your email for the magic link
BetterAuthUI.NAME: Name
BetterAuthUI.NAME_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your full name, or a display name.
BetterAuthUI.PASSKEYS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your passkeys for secure access.
BetterAuthUI.PROVIDERS_DESCRIPTION: Connect your account with a third-party service.
BetterAuthUI.SESSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your active sessions and revoke access.
BetterAuthUI.SIGN_IN_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email below to login to your account
BetterAuthUI.SIGN_UP_DESCRIPTION: Enter your information to create an account
BetterAuthUI.TWO_FACTOR_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your one-time password to continue
BetterAuthUI.TWO_FACTOR_CARD_DESCRIPTION: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
BetterAuthUI.USERNAME_DESCRIPTION: Enter the username you want to use to log in.
BetterAuthUI.VERIFY_YOUR_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Please verify your email address. Check your inbox for the verification email.
BetterAuthUI.API_KEYS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your API keys for secure access.
BetterAuthUI.CREATE_API_KEY_SUCCESS: Please copy your API key and store it in a safe place. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
BetterAuthUI.ORGANIZATION_NAME_DESCRIPTION: This is your organization's visible name.

ProductPage.conditionDetails: Great condition with cut tags. Please review all pictures for details.
ProductPage.authenticityDetails: Every item is rigorously authenticated by our experts. All photos are of the actual product you will receive. We are confident in our processes and stand behind the authenticity of each item sold.
ProductPage.airyAndWarmDescription: Our Alpaca Wool Crewneck Sweater features a bold cable knit design, a comfortable crew neck, and functional side slits, perfect for layering with your go-to pants.
ProductPage.madeInItalyDescription: Fashioned by an Italian mill dedicated to renewable fibers, following sustainable environmental and social standards established by Consorzio Promozione Filati (CPF).
ProductPage.sustainableBabyAlpacaDescription: Made using highest quality Baby Alpaca from Peru (certified mulesing free) and blended with a regenerated polyamide crafted for Cuyana.

CheckoutPage.payment_description: Complete your order with secure payment processing
